item.description: Rumspring: A Crypto-Amish Electric Church Boogaloo The decline of Christianity in the west is accelerating and with it the entire American experiment. For thoughtful followers of Jesus it urgently begs the question “What can we do?!” Throughout the history of God’s people there has been only one answer: return to God’s word and obey. But today, even the most vocal “bible believing” churches have been turned into an adult daycare, worshipping at the altar of emotionalism and “niceness” while staunchly refusing to consider biblical perspectives that don’t fit their narrow conservative cultural traditions.
